snippet.title: Vessels of Decay Steam Trailer 2023-06
snippet.description:
Vessels of Decay is a retro-inspired action-adventure set in post-apocalyptic Scandinavia. You’ll follow siblings Freja and Mud as they navigate an overgrown world, one where monsters of myth and ancient folklore now reign..

Let us know what you think and keep track of the game's development:
Steampage: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1425180/Vessels_of_Decay/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SimonJakobsson
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/Vesselsofdecay/523700
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/Gb35akCa6M
